org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.couvreur

Class Couvreur

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractAlgorithm
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractControllableAlgorithm
        • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractEditableAlgorithm
          • org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.AbstractTranslator<LTL,FSA>
            • org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.couvreur.Couvreur
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, ControllableAlgorithm, EditableAlgorithm, Translator<LTL,FSA>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExtendedCouvreur

    public class Couvreur
extends AbstractTranslator<LTL,FSA>
    This class provides an implementation of the Couvreur's translation algorithm [Jean-Michel Couvreur. On-the-Fly Verification of Linear Temporal Logic. In World Congress on Formal Methods (FM), LNCS 1708, pages 253-271. Springer, 1999].
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.Map<LTL,TransitionSet> acc_map
      A map from a promising formula to a set of transitions that satisfy the promising formula.
      protected FSA aut
      The NTGBW.
      protected java.util.Map<State,LTLSet> ltl_map
      A map from a state to a set of formulae represented by the state.
      protected LTLBDD manager
      A BDD manager.
      static java.lang.String NAME
      The name of this Couvreur's algorithm.
      protected java.util.Map<LTLSet,State> state_map
      A map from a set of formulae to a state that represents the formulae.

      • translate

        public FSA translate(LTL formula)
              throws UnsupportedException
        Simplifies the input formula, convert the formula into negation form, initialize the BDD manager, initialize the NTGBW, create the initial state, invoke expand(LTLSet) to expand the NTGBW, merge equivalent states, and reduce unreachable and dead states.
        Parameters:
        formula - a logic formula to be translate
        Returns:
        the automaton translated from formula
        Throws:
        UnsupportedException - if formula is not supported by this translator

      • expand

        protected void expand(LTLSet init_set)
        Expands the NTGBW from the initial state.
        Parameters:
        init_set - the set of formulae represented by the initial state

      • getPromisedFormula

        protected LTL getPromisedFormula(LTL formula)
        Returns the formula promised by a specified formula.
        Parameters:
        formula - a formula
        Returns:
        the formula promised by the input formula, or null if the input formula is not promising

      • expand

        protected int expand(LTLBDD bdd,
                     LTLSet formulae)
        Returns a BDD that represents a specified set of formulae expanded by tableau rules.
        Parameters:
        bdd - a BDD manager
        formulae - a set of formulae
        Returns:
        a BDD that represents the set of formulae expanded by tableau rules

      • mergeStates

        protected void mergeStates()
        Merge equivalent states in the NTGBW aut. Two states are equivalent if the formulae represented by them have the same BDD.

      • simplifyAcc

        protected void simplifyAcc(FSA aut)
        Simplifies the transition-based generalized Büchi acceptance condition of a specified automaton.
        Parameters:
        aut - an automaton with a transition-based generalized Büchi acceptance condition
